sys_ui_page.description: Display Alarm repartition on DetailView in the portal
sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:requires name="scripts/GlideV2ChartingIncludes.js" includes="true"/>
<g2:evaluate>
var system = RP.getParameterValue('system');
</g2:evaluate>
<div id="gr1" style="height:350px;" />
<script>
	var params = {sysparm_title: "$[system] Alarm severity repartition",  sysparm_field: "severity", sysparm_type: "pie", sysparm_table:  "x_agsa_sapcockpit_alarm", sysparm_aggregate: "COUNT", sysparm_show_legend: "false",  sysparm_show_report_data_label: "true", sysparm_query: "acknowledge=false^sid=$[system]"  };
	var div = $j("#gr1");
	embedReportByParams(div, params);
</script>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: GenAlarmRepartition
